existing_features.title: Update the Spare Part Master form to dynamically render attribute fields based on the definitions loaded from the uploaded file
Connect the AttributeTemplateImport component to use the uploaded file as the source for attribute definitions instead of relying on static templates

new_feature_requests.summary: Parse the uploaded Excel file to extract attribute definitions including attribute names, data types, validation rules, and any associated metadata
Store the parsed attribute definitions in the backend state so they can be used for spare part cataloguing and validation

projectName: Use uploaded file for attribute definitions
